**Markdeep bugs** # Syntax highlighting fails ## Constructor initialization This works: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ c++ Foo() : m_member(bar) { int x; } ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ So does this: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ c++ explicit Foo() { int x; } ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ This doesn't: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ c++ explicit Foo() : m_member(bar) { int x; } ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ## Function pointer failure This works: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ C++ void foo(float foo) { } ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ This doesn't: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ C++ void foo(void(*function_ptr)()) { } ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ## No syntax highlighting for diff files? ~~~ diff --- paths.py +++ paths.py @@ -1,4 +1,4 @@ -RESULT_DIR = "result" +OUTPUT_DIR = "output" ~~~
